snippet.title: Weekend playlist
snippet.description:
Weekend playlist
18 Aug 2007 by splinteredsunrise on Splintered Sunrise splinteredsunrise.wordpress.com/2007/08/18/weekend-playlist-3/
1\. “Ionisation” by Edgard Varèse. 2\. “Salisbury” by Uriah Heep. 3\. “Stephanie Says” by the Velvet Underground. 4\. “The Late Show” by Jackson Browne. 5\. “Beat of Love” by Voice of the Beehive.
Topics: Music

Ionisation Scientists describe ionisation as the process in which, by gaining or losing electrons, atoms or … or negative charge. For his percussion ensemble work Ionisation (1931), Edgard Varèse uses this scientific principle both as the …
